description: Epic to define API contracts for /chat, /status, /moderation; implement OAuth2, mTLS, rate limiting, and secure logging.
acceptanceCriteria: OpenAPI specs for /chat, /status, /moderation defined; data models ChatMessage, Session; versioned endpoints.
OAuth2 and mTLS enforced for all endpoints; token validation and certificate pinning tested.
Rate limiting configured and tested; logs are structured and secure.
Encryption at rest/in transit; IAM least privilege applied; audit logging enabled.
